text: Source Bates # Care Provider Entry Date Visit Date Summary Service Type Charges Amount Paid Plaintiff's RFPD Response No. 1 1 Dr. Smith, PCP 01/23/24 1/23/24 Pt presents after fall from ladder with severe left ankle pain and inability to bear weight. Exam reveals swelling, deformity, and tenderness. X-ray ordered. Diagnosis: Suspected ankle fracture. Office Visit $250 $200 Plaintiff's RFPD Response No. 1 2 Radiology, Sierra Vista 01/23/24 1/23/24 X-ray report confirms trimalleolar fracture of the left ankle. X-ray Report $500 $500 Plaintiff's RFPD Response No. 1 3 Dr. Jones, Ortho 01/24/24 1/24/24 Surgical consult. Diagnosis confirmed. Pt to undergo ORIF due to unstable fracture. Risks and benefits discussed. Surgery scheduled for 01/25/2024. Surgical Consult $300 $250 Plaintiff's RFPD Response No. 1 4 Sierra Vista Hospital Records 01/25/24 01/25/24 Pt undergoes ORIF of left ankle. Post-op diagnosis: Trimalleolar fracture, left ankle. Procedure notes indicate successful fixation. ORIF Procedure $8,000 $6,000 Plaintiff's RFPD Response No. 1 5 Sierra Vista Hospital Records 01/26/24 01/26/24 Post-op day 1. Pt reports pain controlled by medication. Incision clean, pulses palpable. Discharge planned for tomorrow with NWB instructions and follow-up with orthopedist in 1 week. Hospital Stay $1,200 $900 Plaintiff's RFPD Response No. 1 6 Dr. Jones 02/01/24 02/01/24 Post-op follow-up. Incision healing well, no signs of infection. Pt reports pain improving. Sutures removed. NWB status continued. Referral to physical therapy. Office Visit $150 $120 Plaintiff's RFPD Response No. 1 7 PT Notes 02/08/24 02/08/24 Initial PT evaluation. Pt presents with limited ROM, strength, and swelling. Gentle exercises initiated. Home exercise program provided. PT Evaluation $200 $160 Plaintiff's RFPD Response No. 1 8-9 PT Notes 02/15/24 02/15/24 Continued PT. Pt demonstrating gradual improvements in ROM and strength. Swelling decreasing. Pt tolerating increased weight-bearing activities. Physical Therapy $400 $320 Plaintiff's RFPD Response No. 1 10 Dr. Jones 02/22/24 02/22/24 Follow-up. X-rays show good alignment. Pt progressing well in PT. Weight-bearing status advanced to PWB. Discussion about return to work initiated. Office VisitX-ray $250$150
